speakers.name: Barbara Forbes
speakers.title: Azure Architect @ Zure | Azure MVP | GitHub Star
speakers.bio: Barbara Forbes is an Azure Architect & consultant at Zure in the Netherlands, a Microsoft Azure MVP, Microsoft Certified Trainer (MCT), and a GitHub Star. She works at the intersection of technology, strategy, education, and development. Her focus is on the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework, Generative AI, Infrastructure as Code, PowerShell, and GitHub.

speakers.name: Geert van der Cruijsen
speakers.title: CEO Zure Netherlands
speakers.bio: Geert van der Cruijsen is the CEO of Zure Netherlands, helping companies improve how they build software by combining strong engineering culture with modern technology. He focuses on DevOps, cloud-native development, architecture and AI, enabling teams to work more autonomously and deliver faster through smart platforms and better ways of working.

speakers.name: Rik Hepworth
speakers.title: Founder and CEO, Zure UK | Azure MVP | Microsoft Regional Director
speakers.bio: Rik helps organisations use Cloud better as CEO and co-founder of Zure UK. Whether that is a new adoption where governance and management are key, or an application modernisation project where technology choice and team knowledge are important factors in success.

speakers.name: Jan de Vries
speakers.title: Principal Azure and AI Architect at Zure
speakers.bio: I'm a passionate engineer, with over 20 years of experience designing and delivering innovative solutions. My regular work centers on building reliable, scalable systems in Microsoft Azure and creating GenAI-powered solutions.

speakers.name: Pasi Huuhka
speakers.title: DevOps Architect at Zure | DevTech MVP
speakers.bio: Pasi Huuhka is a Microsoft Azure MVP with a background spanning DevOps, full stack software development, architecture, and systems administration. Since 2013, he's worked hands-on with a broad range of Azure's platform-native, container-based and serverless offerings.

speakers.name: Glenn Colpaert
speakers.title: CTO at Zure Belgium | Azure MVP
speakers.bio: Glenn Colpaert is co-founder and CTO at Zure Belgium. He is a Microsoft Azure MVP since 2014 and is a frequent speaker at national and international events. Currently, he's mainly focused on designing and building secure, scalable cloud-based solutions on Microsoft Azure.
